channel.title: Help urgent
channel.description: IN MY 317 [PI] SOURCE MY OWNER RANK IS 4 ADMIN 3 MOD 2 DONAR 1 PLAYER 0 BUT IF I PUT IT AS IT DONATOR IS 4 OWNER 3 ADMIN 2 MOD 1 PLAYER 0 I WANT IT TO ME LIKE OWNER AS 4 WITH THE ACTUAL SIGNS NOT DONATOR SIGN HELP PLZ!

item.title: Help urgent
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

To change the symbol you get for each rank, it’s client sided in client.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Help urgent
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

ProjectPvpTehe:

where’s that located and do I change them to whatever rights I want them to be?

You should probably go learn java… That’s pseudocode. It’s just an english representation of what code looks like. The point I was getting across was: A donator having rights of the value four would have more powers than an Administrator or an Owner. Project Insanity sources are programmed in ascension. Meaning that the server will first check for people having rights of zero or higher, and within that check if the player has rights 1 or higher, then 2 or higher, then 3 or higher, then 4 or higher. Meaning that 4 would have the most powers. If you want donators to be able to have every single power that an owner has and more…

Read full topic

item.title: Help urgent
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

[PI] isn’t programmed that way. The list of permissions goes

if rights are 0 if rights are 1 if rights are 2 if rights are 3

Read full topic
